特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
*The format and schedule may change during the semester, depending on student needs and the evolving coronavirus situation.

This seminar style class will be conducted face to face. The LMS will be Google Classroom. Students will need a Gmail account. Assignments will be conducted, and lesson resources provided, on Google Classroom. As such, students will need access to a computer at home.

Students will engage in active learning in English: working together in pairs, groups, and as a whole class on listening, speaking, reading and writing activities, and individually researching, writing, and performing short presentations.

トピック.授業外学習2:
Outside of class:
- Every week you must complete homework assignments. You will research and write about textbook topics
and prepare short presentations. It is very important to complete assignments every time.
- Review each lesson, and check any new content, language or skills learned.
- Access any online material required on Google Classroom. Some assignments may involve online research.
- You should expect to spend about 1 hour doing homework per class period.
- Do not hesitate to contact me if you need any help, I’m happy to speak to you.
